Captain.Title: Martok
Captain.Ability: All of your Klingon Upgrades cost -1SP. ACTION: When attacking this round, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may roll 2 less attack dice to add 1 [HIT] result to your roll. If you only have Klingon cards assigned to your ship, roll 1 less attack die, instead of 2.

Captain.Title: Telek R'Mor
Captain.Ability: Each time you defend, if you have at least 1 [SCAN] Token beside your ship, roll +1 defense die. You may field the "Secret Research" [ELITE TALENT] Upgrade.

Captain.Title: Alidar Jarok
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1 and remove 1 Token ([EVADE], [SCAN], [BATTLESTATIONS], or [TARGET LOCK]) from beside that ship. If you remove a [TARGET LOCK] Token with this ability, also remove the corresponding [TARGET LOCK] Token.
Captain.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1 and remove 1 Token ([EVADE], [SCAN], [BATTLESTATIONS], or [TARGET LOCK]) from beside that ship. If you remove a [TARGET LOCK] Token with this ability, also remove the corresponding [TARGET LOCK] Token.
